text: so, am i depressed? i'm honestly unsure myself, because of my poor memory i can't remember feeling any other way
i originally put it in askreddit, but realized this would be a more appropriate place) i've come to the realization that i may be severely depressed
how did you do it? am i even depressed at all? i'm feeling desperate, any advice at all would be helpful
have been depressed for approximately 20 years, diagnosed for about 6, medicated and with therapist for those same 6
i don't know if i'm depressed or if i'm being over dramatic about little things
